items.summary: Replace the founder profile image (Barnali Chakraborty) in the Core Team section with the uploaded BarnaliFinalSSize.png image, maintaining 400x400 dimensions to match existing team member images

Generate a completely unique filename for the founder profile image that has never been used before (e.g., 'barnali-ceo-v34.dim_400x400.png') to force all browsers and CDNs to treat it as an entirely new asset

Implement triple-layer cache-busting strategy: (1) use completely unique filename never used before, (2) append timestamp query parameter to image URL, and (3) add HTTP cache-control meta tags in the image loading logic to prevent browser caching

Add explicit cache-invalidation mechanism in the CoreTeam component by including a unique cache-busting key based on build timestamp or version number that forces React to treat the image as a completely new element
